intro.description: This group contains links to the online video demonstrations of NCD data reduction stages. In order to play demo videos please check that "Use external web browser" preference is selected in "Window > Preferences > General > Web Browser" preference page and start by selecting "Click to Begin" link below.. In order to play demo videos please check that "Use external web browser" preference is selected in "Window > Preferences > General > Web Browser" preference page and start by selecting "Click to Begin" link.

item.title: Calibration Demo
item.description: Click on the link below to watch calibration demo in a browser

item.title: NCD Data Reduction Demo
item.description: Click on the link below to watch data reduction demo in a browser
